thread.section_title: Adagio Paris Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, amazing view & friendly staff
thread.title_full: Great location, amazing view & friendly staff - Review of Adagio Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Julian L
title: Great location, amazing view & friendly staff
text:
The hotel's location can't be better - just 10 min from the Eiffel Tower and only 5 min from the nearest Metro/RER stations with fast links to Orly Airport.
We stayed for 2 nights and check in was less then 2 min. I've asked for room with a view to the Eiffel Tower and the guy at reception told us that that we can have the room at 3pm.
The room/studio apartment was nice and clean (23rd floor) and Wi-Fi speed wasn't that bad. Bed confy enough.
Overall experience 5+ apart the air con that wasn't working they way it should. Bed
Will come back again and highly recommend - great value for money!
Room Tip: Best view from 23rd floor See more room tips
